product.composition: Top notes: rose, grapefruit and litchi; middle notes: magnolia and damask rose; base notes: oakmoss, cedar, amber and musk.

story.inspiration: Luminous and effortlessly feminine, L'Eau is the essence of a woman at one with the infinite grace of nature.An unforgettable blush coral hue, L'Eau is a bright burst of rose accented by the fresh and iridescent magnetism of magnolia. The bottle blends Chloé's iconic glass groove pleats with a grosgrain ribbon made to match the elegant scent.

comments: This is soooo lovely in the summer. Light, sweet, fresh rose with a hint of lemon and a bit of dryness from the vetiver.
So much mention about this fragrance from women around me. Like a fresh scent for day time. Which is something that I love. So interesting..

product.composition: Top notes: freesia; middle notes: mirabelle; base notes: oakmoss.

story.inspiration: It was created from inspiration by freedom, surprises, desire for open spaces and empowerment. It captures the essence of a free-spirited and confident woman and her experiences and encounters.

comments: First I found it a bit boring and left it in a drawer for a month. Then I found it on a rainy spring day, and this really bloomed. Suddenly I smelled rose and the fruity, with something deep playing up against the fresh floral.

If I dare the word, it is more than unisex, it is transgender. Imagine the golden, tender smell of a typical feminine mirabelle plum, slightly acidulous, mixed with the fresh and pungent trail of male shaving foam.

product.accords: white floral, citrus, musky, woody, fresh spicy
product.composition: Top notes: petitgrain, neroli, orange blossom; middle notes: jasmine, stephanotis, physalis fruit; base notes: cedarwood.

story.inspiration: It's a floral, fresh and sexy fragrance inspired by the modern story of seduction. The flacon was inspired by a lock, yet conveys Chloé's unique feminine touches. Locks, seen on the famous Pont des Arts love bridge in Paris, have become an international symbol of love.

comments: A beautiful scent that can stand on its own even if it is compared to other perfumes. It’s actually an underdog because it’s floral, fresh and nice for the summer. A good perfume for women in their 20’s.

Very sweet and very flowery, perfect for daily use, for school, office, etc. It's not like super long lasting, but it definitely lasts longer than the usual perfumes. I loved it from the second I smelled a sample.
